Documentation

indented :: Parser ()

withSep :: Parser a -> Parser a

withScope :: Parser a -> Parser a

Introduces a new scope around a parser. Future invocations of inScope, for example, will reference the SourcePos stored from the most recent invocation of withScope, or initialPos if it has not been invoked.

sep :: Parser ()
